narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Step Ahead Aba LLC is a Behavior Analyst provider based in Charlotte, NC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $15.4M in Medicaid payments across 58K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $15.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
